languages.text: "Я прошла Путем пробуждения, элантах. И научилась видеть то, что сокрыто. И слышать то, что не было сказано. Оказавшись на Лилэтан, я наблюдала достаточно за твоими сородичами, чтобы познать истинную сущность мон-кай. Не думаю, что ты расскажешь мне что-то новое". {n}Окинув мимолетным взглядом офицеров мостика, эльдарка устало вздыхает.{/n} "Впрочем, протестовать я не стану. На всем корабле лишь разговоры с тобой могут скрасить мое одиночество".

"I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."
languages.original_text: "Я прошла Путем пробуждения, элантах. И научилась видеть то, что сокрыто. И слышать то, что не было сказано. Оказавшись на Лилэтан, я наблюдала достаточно за твоими сородичами, чтобы познать истинную сущность мон-кай. Не думаю, что ты расскажешь мне что-то новое". {n}Окинув мимолетным взглядом офицеров мостика, эльдарка устало вздыхает.{/n} "Впрочем, протестовать я не стану. На всем корабле лишь разговоры с тобой могут скрасить мое одиночество".

traits.locale_text: "I had went down the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned see that which is hidden and hear what hadn't been said. After ending up on Lilaethan, I watched your kinsmen long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I don't think you can tell me anything new." {n}Giving a fleeting gaze to the bridge officers, the Aeldari lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I'm not going to protest. You are the only person who can illuminate my loneliness."

You are the only person who can illuminate my loneliness."

Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

languages.text: “我曾走过觉醒的道途，外界人，也学会了如何观察隐蔽的真相，聆听弦外之音。在莉莱赞生活时，我曾经长时间地观察你的族人，足以了解猴子的本性。我不认为你的理解比我更透彻。”{n}伊莉耶特扫了一眼舰桥上来来往往的军官，发出了疲惫的叹息。{/n}“不过，我不会反对与你交谈。在这艘飞船上，只有与你交谈才能稍稍减轻我的孤独。”
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

traits.locale_text: “我曾走过觉醒的道途，外界人，也学会了如何观察隐蔽的真相，聆听弦外之音。在莉莱赞生活时，我曾经长时间地观察你的族人，足以了解猴子的本性。我不认为你的理解比我更透彻。”{n}伊莉耶特扫了一眼舰桥上来来往往的军官，发出了疲惫的叹息。{/n}“不过，我不会反对与你交谈。在这艘飞船上，只有与你交谈才能稍稍减轻我的孤独。”

languages.text: «He recorrido la Senda del Despertar, elantach, y he aprendido a ver lo que está oculto y oír lo que no se dice. Durante mi estancia en el Lilaethan, observé a los de tu especie el tiempo suficiente para entender la verdadera naturaleza de los mon-keigh. Dudo que puedas revelarme nada que no sepa ya». {n}Yrliet echa una mirada fugaz a los oficiales del puente y deja escapar un suspiro de hastío.{/n} «A pesar de ello, no protestaré. Mis conversaciones contigo son lo único en toda la nave que consigue mitigar mi soledad».
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

Dudo que puedas revelarme nada que no sepa ya». {n}Yrliet echa una mirada fugaz a los oficiales del puente y deja escapar un suspiro de hastío.{/n} «A pesar de ello, no protestaré. Mis conversaciones contigo son lo único en toda la nave que consigue mitigar mi soledad».

languages.text: « J'ai arpenté la Voie de l'Éveil, elantach, et j'ai appris à voir ce qui est caché et à entendre ce qui est tu. Quand je suis arrivée sur la lilaethan, j'ai étudié votre espèce suffisamment longtemps pour comprendre la véritable nature des mon-keigh. Je ne pense pas que vous puissiez m'apprendre quoi que ce soit que je ne sache déjà. » {n}Elle jette un regard vague en direction des officiers de la passerelle et laisse échapper un soupir las.{/n} « Mais je ne refuserai pas cette proposition. Les conversations que nous partageons à bord de ce vaisseau sont la seule chose qui me sort de ma solitude. »
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. Je ne pense pas que vous puissiez m'apprendre quoi que ce soit que je ne sache déjà. » {n}Elle jette un regard vague en direction des officiers de la passerelle et laisse échapper un soupir las.{/n} « Mais je ne refuserai pas cette proposition. Les conversations que nous partageons à bord de ce vaisseau sont la seule chose qui me sort de ma solitude. »

languages.text: "Ich habe den Pfad der Erweckung beschritten, Elantach, ich sehe das Verborgene und höre das Unausgesprochene. Ich habe die Euren auf der Lileath lange genug beobachtet, um die wahre Natur der Chem-Pan-Sey zu kennen. Ich denke nicht, dass Ihr mir etwas erzählen könnt, das ich noch nicht weiß." {n}Sie wirft einen kurzen Blick auf die Offiziere auf der Brücke und seufzt dann müde.{/n} "Trotzdem werde ich nicht protestieren. Die Gespräche mit Euch sind auf diesem Schiff die einzige Linderung für meine Einsamkeit."
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

Ich denke nicht, dass Ihr mir etwas erzählen könnt, das ich noch nicht weiß." {n}Sie wirft einen kurzen Blick auf die Offiziere auf der Brücke und seufzt dann müde.{/n} "Trotzdem werde ich nicht protestieren. Die Gespräche mit Euch sind auf diesem Schiff die einzige Linderung für meine Einsamkeit."

languages.text: 「我は覚醒の道を歩いているのだ、エランタ。そして隠されたものを見て、語られざるものを聞くことを学んだ。リラエタンにいたとき、モン＝ケイの本質を理解するのに十分な時間をかけてお前の種族を観察した。まだ知らないことをお前から教わることができるとは思えない」{n}ブリッジにいる士官たちに一瞬視線を投げかけ、彼女は疲れたようなため息を漏らす。{/n}「それでも、我は抗議しない。お前との会話が唯一、この船で我の孤独を和らげてくれるものなのだからな」
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

languages.text: "Uyanışın Yolu'nda yürüdüm ben elantach. Gizlenmiş olanı görmeyi, söylenmemiş olanı duymayı öğrendim. Kendimi Lilaethan'da bulduğumda, mon-keighlerin gerçek doğasını anlayacak kadar uzun süre senin türünü gözlemledim. Bana bilmediğim bir şey söyleyebileceğini sanmıyorum." {n}Köprüdeki subaylara kaçamak bir bakış attıktan sonra bitkince nefes veriyor.{/n} "Yine de karşı gelmeyeceğim. Bu gemide yalnızlığımı dindiren tek şey, seninle sohbetlerimiz."
languages.original_text: "I have walked the Path of Awakening, elantach, and learned to see that which is hidden and hear that which is unspoken. When I found myself on the Lilaethan, I watched your kind long enough to understand the true nature of mon-keigh. I do not think you can tell me anything I do not already know." {n}Casting a fleeting gaze at the officers on the bridge, she lets out a weary sigh.{/n} "Nevertheless, I will not protest. Conversations with you are the only thing on this ship that can ease my solitude."

traits.locale_text: "Uyanışın Yolu'nda yürüdüm ben elantach. Gizlenmiş olanı görmeyi, söylenmemiş olanı duymayı öğrendim. Bana bilmediğim bir şey söyleyebileceğini sanmıyorum." {n}Köprüdeki subaylara kaçamak bir bakış attıktan sonra bitkince nefes veriyor.{/n} "Yine de karşı gelmeyeceğim. Bu gemide yalnızlığımı dindiren tek şey, seninle ettiğim muhabbetler."
